tool_description: An API showing the latest news in English from Nicaragua
name: Nicaragua News en English
title: Nicaragua News en English

api_list.name: Get All Nicaragua News_copy
api_list.description: This endpoint returns news about Nicaragua in English
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nicaragua-news-en-english.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nicaragua-news-en-english.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News from One Source
api_list.description: This endpoint gets news from one source
